summary: This bill, H.R. 1431, aims to designate the United States Postal Service facility located at 2407 State Route 71, Suite 1, in Spring Lake, New Jersey, as the "James J. Howard Post Office." The bill specifies the official designation and mandates that any existing references to the facility be updated accordingly. It was introduced in the House of Representatives on February 18, 2025, and referred to the Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.
